thread.title: Short Answer: Who’s Buying Luxury Goods?
thread.title_full: Short Answer: Who’s Buying Luxury Goods? - WSJ

author: Willa Plank
title: Short Answer: Who’s Buying Luxury Goods?
text:
Sales of luxury accessories, apparel and jewelry in the U.S. have rebounded since the financial crisis. Accessible luxury brand Michael Kors has been growing, but shows recent signs of a slowdown. In China, jewelry and accessories sales have boomed, but the corruption crackdown has damped the market. Italy remains a big presence for the designer apparel and footwear market.
